Twice a day I feed Philip & Buster, neighborhood stray cats. Sometimes I stay out there watching them eat. A warm, fine part of the day.
God, this guy is a horror.
There are a few positives here. For example, if you tweet, simply, "God, this guy is a horror," EVERYONE will know of whom you talk.
We have an opening now. We should call him the "so-called president."

@TimJGraham It's a strange place to be. I understand that. But there is no precedent for this. The world will be saved by people like you.

@TimJGraham There is no precedent for this situation. You cannot apply anything from before. It doesn't fit.

@robdelaney CNN did to the extent that Trump HATES them. Tapper and Stelter were very tough. I think this is a false narrative, honestly.
@robdelaney U don't think we've been doing that, Rob? The Wapo alone spent 2 years warning the public he'd destroy us. Horse to water, man.
@fairflattaxnow HE invoked the millions who voted 4 him. if they count, what about the millions MORE who saw him for exactly what he was?
@evanbirnholz No. The japanese were planning to defend the island to the deaths of millions. Hirohito felt they could absorb 3 more nukes.
@evanbirnholz I do not think Truman had a choice, esp. with Hiroshima. I don't fault him for that. You do?
Hey! Only two presidents had names beginning with "Tru." The first one was pretty good, so maybe things will go swell. #PieInSkyScenarios

@AsympU Thank you, and I know. I was nervous. Of course if it went badly, I could have told her immediately. You are a woman, yes?
@snowgall We are talking about Milo here, are we not? He is a total a-hole jackass, but they are just stupid objectionable words and ideas.
@AsympU I had no time. We were at my stop. I simply wouldn't have included her name. To the pretty lady, etc.

A mere seven days in, we are pretty well at the point where we are at war with our own president for the soul of the nation. We will win.
